name: binary-ring-content-management
description: Comprehensive content management system for Binary Ring generative art projects

scripts.search-test: node -e "import('./content-manager.js').then(m => new m.default(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY).searchContent('fractal').then(r => console.log('Search results:', r.length)))"
scripts.analytics: node -e "import('./content-manager.js').then(m => new m.default(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY).getContentAnalytics().then(a => console.log('Content analytics:', a.length, 'projects')))"
scripts.test: npm run search-test && npm run analytics
scripts.setup: echo 'Please set SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_ANON_KEY environment variables'

author: Binary Ring Collective
